name: KSmart
0:
”Alexa, turn on the bedroom lamp”

skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Description
K Smart, is an intelligent hardware, the main function of the skills to control the socket,make sure you have the latest Alexa app on your device, you have your K Smart socket, and activate the K Smart Skill. This will require your K Smart app account email and password to authorize Alexa to access your devices.
